summary: The bearded, bawdy and comically bitter Tom Segura gets real about body piercings, the "Area 51" of men's bodies, and the lie he told Mike Tyson.
cast: Gabriel G. Alvarez|I. Elijah Baughman|Brandon Brown|Davis Choh|Javiar Diaz|Alfred Gilliam|Kyle Helf|Armando Heredia|Leah Lamarr|Ricardo Martin|Brashaad Mayweather|Alberto Monquero|Yuny Parada|Savannah Rivera|Johnny Ruilova|Tom Segura|Tian Wang
keywords: stand up special|reenactment|stand up comedy|tv special
title: Tom Segura: Mostly Stories
